translations.translation: He said to those around him, 'Are you listening?'
(The Pharaoh) said to those around him: "Do you hear?"
Pharaoh said to those around him: "Do you hear (what he says)?"
The Pharaoh said to the people around him, "Did you hear that?"
Said Firaun to those around him, “Are you not listening with attention?”
(Fir`awn) said to those around: "Do you not hear (what he says)"
(Firon) said to those around him: Do you not hear?
Said he to those about him, 'Do you not hear?'
(Pharaoh) said unto those around him: Hear ye not?
Pharaoh said to those around him, "Did you hear?"
Fir'awn said unto those around him: hear ye not?
He said to those who were around him, ‘Don’t you hear?!’
(Pharaoh) said to those around: "Did ye not listen (to what he says)?"
Fir'aun (Pharaoh) said to those around: "Do you not hear (what he says)?"
Do you not hear' said he (Pharaoh) to those around him.
He said to those around him, “Do you not hear?”
[Pharaoh] said to those around him, "Do you not hear?"
[26:25] He, Pharaoh, said to those, noblemen among his folk, who were around him, ‘Did you not hear?!’, his response, how it does not correspond to the question [I asked]?

((Pharaoh) said unto those around him) of attendants: (Hear ye not) what Moses says? There were around Pharaoh at that time 250 men wearing attires made of silk brocade plaited with gold. These men were Pharaoh's closest courtiers, and they asked Moses: who is this Lord of the heavens and the earth to whom you are calling us?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما سمع من موسى ما سمع { قَالَ } فرعون { لِمَنْ حَوْلَهُ } من ملئه وأشرافه متهمكاً بجوابه: { أَلاَ تَسْتَمِعُونَ } [الشعراء: 25] جوابه أيها العقلاء، سألته عن حقيقته وذاته فأجاب بعد أفعاله وآثاره المترتبة على أوصافه وأسمائه التي هي من عوارض ذاته

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ قال } فرعونُ، عند سماع جوابه عليه السلام، خوفاً من تأثيره في قلوبهم، { لِمن حولَه } من أشراف قومه، وكانوا خمسمائة مسورة بالأسورة: { أَلا تستمعون } ، أنا أسأله عن الماهية، وهو يجيبني بالخاصية
 ولما كانت ما هي الربوبية لا تُدرك ولا تنال حقيقتها، أجابه بما يمكن إدراكه من خواص الماهية
